description: Ms. codex. One illustration in color on fol. 3a. Ms. erroneously foliated beginning on second leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation.
author: Muḥammad ibn al-Muhtār.
contents: 2. fol. 19b-21b: al-Risālah al-baḥrīyah fī al-ṣanʻah al-ilāhīyah.
extent: i, 23, i leaves : paper, col. ill. ; 242 x 175 mm. bound to 246 x 180 mm.
creator: Muḥammad ibn al-Muhtār.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
